============
V1 Resources
============

The following Resources are supported by the version 1 wrapper class.

To use version 1 of the API::

    from guildwars2.v1 import GuildWars2API

    api = GuildWars2API()
    api.items.get()

The Following are the resources that are supported by version 1 of the API. See the official documentation at https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/API:1
